version_description: Remote 2.4 adds support for iOS 6.
Remote 2.4 adds support for iOS 6.

Remote is simpler and easier with new ways to browse your library and see and edit upcoming songs with Up Next. A redesigned experience for the iPad shows all the songs in an album with the Expanded view and a more powerful search delivers results as you

Remote is simpler and easier with new ways to browse your library and see and edit upcoming songs with Up Next. A redesigned experience for the iPad shows all the songs in an album with the Expanded view and a more powerful search delivers results as you
Includes improvements for search results, rating songs, sorting podcasts, and general stability.
Includes improvements for search results, rating songs, sorting podcasts, and general stability.
Control your Apple TV with simple finger gestures (requires iPhone OS 3.0)
Control your Apple TV with simple finger gestures (requires iPhone OS 3.0)
Remote 1.3.1 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9.0.
Remote 1.3.1 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9.0.
Remote 1.3.2 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9 and Apple TV 3.
Remote 1.3.2 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9 and Apple TV 3.
Remote 1.3.3 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9 and Apple TV 3.
Remote 1.3.3 provides bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 9 and Apple TV 3.
This version of Remote adds the ability to control iTunes Radio on your Mac or PC.
This version of Remote adds the ability to control iTunes Radio on your Mac or PC.

• Designed for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad
• Optimized for Retina displays and large screen real estate on iPad
• Support for Shared Libraries on iTunes and new Apple TV
• Bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 10 and the new Apple TV

• Designed for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad
• Optimized for Retina displays and large screen real estate on iPad
• Support for Shared Libraries on iTunes and new Apple TV
• Bug fixes and compatibility with iTunes 10 and the new Apple TV

What's New in Version 2.0.1

• Includes stability and performance improvements.

• Improves performance using Remote on an iPhone when Bluetooth is enabled.

• Addresses a problem browsing artists with a large number of albums.

What's New in Version 2.0.1

• Includes stability and performance improvements.

• Improves performance using Remote on an iPhone when Bluetooth is enabled.

• Addresses a problem browsing artists with a large number of albums.

• AirPlay video support to control iTunes on your computer to stream videos to an Apple TV
• Internet radio control to play thousands of internet radio streams in iTunes on your computer
• The ability to control iTunes on your computer to play Movie

• AirPlay video support to control iTunes on your computer to stream videos to an Apple TV
• Internet radio control to play thousands of internet radio streams in iTunes on your computer
• The ability to control iTunes on your computer to play Movie

• Improvements when connecting to iTunes or Apple TV
• Addition of a "skip back" button when playing video
• Additional stability and performance improvements
• When controlling iTunes on a Mac, Mac OS X version 10.6.7 or later is recommended.

• Improvements when connecting to iTunes or Apple TV
• Addition of a "skip back" button when playing video
• Additional stability and performance improvements
• When controlling iTunes on a Mac, Mac OS X version 10.6.7 or later is recommended.

This update includes the following improvements:

• You can now control iTunes Radio on your Apple TV
• Browse your purchased movies and TV shows in the app and play them on Apple TV
• Additional bug fixes and stability improvements

This update includes the following improvements:

• You can now control iTunes Radio on your Apple TV
• Browse your purchased movies and TV shows in the app and play them on Apple TV
• Additional bug fixes and stability improvements

What's New in Version 2.2
• Provides compatibility with iOS 5
• Provides additional stability and performance improvements

Included in Version 2.1.1
• Improvements when connecting to iTunes or Apple TV
• Addition of a "skip back" button

Remote 4.2.1 includes a number of minor performance improvements and adds support for iOS 8.
Remote 4.2.1 includes a number of minor performance improvements and adds support for iOS 8.
This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.
This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.
Remote app adds support for the new Apple TV (4th generation) providing similar functionality as it did with Apple TV (3rd generation) for text input, navigation, and control.
Remote app adds support for the new Apple TV (4th generation) providing similar functionality as it did with Apple TV (3rd generation) for text input, navigation, and control.
iTunes Remote has been updated for iOS 10. This update also includes a number of minor performance and stability improvements.
iTunes Remote has been updated for iOS 10. This update also includes a number of minor performance and stability improvements.
This update adds support for Two-Factor Authentication when signing in for Home Sharing.
This update adds support for Two-Factor Authentication when signing in for Home Sharing.

iTunes Remote has been updated to add support for iPhone X. This update also includes an all new look and feel on iPad and iPhone, in addition to stability and performance improvements. iTunes 12.7.5 is recommended for use with Remote 4.4.

iTunes Remote has been updated to add support for iPhone X. This update also includes an all new look and feel on iPad and iPhone, in addition to stability and performance improvements. iTunes 12.7.5 is recommended for use with Remote 4.4.

This update fixes an issue where iTunes Remote may unexpectedly quit when using the in-app keyboard with Apple TV.

It also:
- Resolves an issue that prevented AirPlay streaming with videos
- Restores the repeat control for video playlists

iTunes Remote has been updated to add support for the new iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd generation) and iPad Pro 11-inch.

This update also includes:
- Improved network connectivity
- New shortcuts to play and shuffle playlists and albums
- Impro
